docs.snippet: Often divided over international relations, but with so much in common, leaders from both countries have found it difficult to avoid meddling in each other’s politics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Often divided over international relations, but with so much in common, leaders from both countries have found it difficult to avoid meddling in each other’s politics.
docs.abstract: Funeral of former Israeli Prime Min Shimon Peres brings together American and Israeli leaders who have clashed in past, with Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, former Pres Bill Clinton and Pres Obama in attendance.

headline.main: At Shimon Peres Funeral, a Lineup of U.S. and Israeli Leaders Who Tangled
headline.print_headline: United at Peres’s Funeral, U.S. and Israeli Leaders Who Feuded for Years

docs.snippet: The Commission on Presidential Debates said a technical malfunction affected the volume of Mr. Trump’s microphone in the debate hall....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Commission on Presidential Debates said a technical malfunction affected the volume of Mr. Trump’s microphone in the debate hall.
docs.abstract: Commission on Presidential Debates reports finding that unspecified technical malfunction affected volume of Donald Trump's voice within hall during first debate; while Trump was clearly audible to television audience, his complaints about his microphone appear to have been warranted.

headline.main: Actually, a Malfunction Did Affect Donald Trump’s Voice at the Debate
headline.print_headline: Something Was Wrong With Volume, Panel Finds

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and PATRICK HEALY

docs.snippet: In a leaked recording from a February fundraiser, Hillary Clinton expressed empathy for young voters who were siding with her primary opponent, Bernie Sanders, saying that for people who don't see any economic opportunities, the idea that "you cou...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a leaked recording from a February fundraiser, Hillary Clinton expressed empathy for young voters who were siding with her primary opponent, Bernie Sanders, saying that for people who don't see any economic opportunities, the idea that "you could be part of a political revolution is pretty appealing."

headline.main: Clinton's Remarks on Young Voters Fuel New Trump Pitch
headline.print_headline: Clinton's Remarks on Young Voters Fuel New Trump Pitch

docs.abstract: Timothy Egan Op-Ed column contends Donald Trump's renewed attempt to fat shame former Miss Universe Alicia Machado is insulting to many Americans who struggle with weight and illustrates his unfitness for presidency; notes that Trump, while obsessed with beauty, is strange-looking himself.
